level.text: There shall be repair industry category designated as “electronics equipment” which shall include television receivers, radios, audio or video tape recorders or players, phonographs, amplifiers, speakers, transmitters, receiver systems, and any associated electronic components normally used or sold for use in the home.

The Department shall establish repair industry specialties within the electronics equipment repair category (such as TV repair, sound reproduction equipment, etc.) and identify the types of electronics equipment repair services included in each specialty.

The Department shall establish technical definitions, practices, and procedural requirements consistent with this chapter, including definitions of the following electronics equipment repair terms and services along with others that the Department may deem appropriate:
